text: 7.52 2 Sto 36.16, Mat 21.35, 23.31, 1 Te 2.15 Nased sɨkop kɨli bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok kɨlop mɨdupsek gɨ tɨmel gɨlak agak. Bɨ ogɨnap kɨli God bɨ teplep mɨdeb ne ak ownɨgab agɨlak okok, nased sɨkop kɨli bɨ anɨb okok kɨlop mɨdupsek paklɨlak agak. Nɨbi pen, bɨ teplep anɨb ak apek, mɨmug nɨŋɨd ñapek agak.
